targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	count(*)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND charge_energy_added > 0.01
	AND car_id = $car_id;

SELECT
	sum(charge_energy_added)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id;

SELECT
	sum(cp.cost)
FROM
	charging_processes cp
LEFT JOIN 
	addresses addr ON addr.id = address_id
LEFT JOIN
  geofences geo ON geo.id = geofence_id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(end_date)
  AND (addr.name LIKE '%Supercharger%' OR geo.name LIKE '%Supercharger%')
	AND cp.cost IS NOT NULL
	AND cp.car_id = $car_id;

SELECT
	sum(cost)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id;

SELECT (
  SELECT sum(cost)
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE $__timeFilter(end_date) AND car_id = $car_id
) / (
	SELECT convert_km((max(odometer) - min(odometer))::numeric, '$length_unit')
	FROM positions
	WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND car_id = $car_id
) * 100

SELECT (
  SELECT sum(cost)
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE $__timeFilter(end_date) AND car_id = $car_id
) / (
  SELECT sum(greatest(charge_energy_added, charge_energy_used))
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE $__timeFilter(end_date) AND car_id = $car_id
)

SELECT
	$__time(start_date),
	start_battery_level,
	end_battery_level
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(start_date)
	AND duration_min > 3
	AND car_id = $car_id
ORDER BY
	start_date;

WITH charges AS (
	SELECT
		start_date,
		start_battery_level,
		end_battery_level,
		p.odometer,
		COALESCE(
			LAG(p.odometer) OVER (
				ORDER BY cp.start_date
			),
			p.odometer
		) as odometer_prev
	FROM
		charging_processes cp
	JOIN positions p
	ON p.id = cp.position_id
	WHERE
		$__timeFilter(cp.start_date)
		AND cp.duration_min > 3
		AND cp.car_id = $car_id
)
SELECT
	MIN(start_date) as time,
	MIN(start_battery_level) as "Start SOC",
	MAX(end_battery_level) as "End SOC"
FROM charges
GROUP BY
	CASE WHEN odometer - odometer_prev < 2 THEN odometer_prev ELSE odometer END
ORDER BY
	time;

WITH data AS (
  SELECT
		cp.id,
		cp.charge_energy_added,
		CASE WHEN NULLIF(mode() within group (order by charger_phases),0) is null THEN 'DC'
				 ELSE 'AC'
		END AS current
	FROM charging_processes cp
  RIGHT JOIN charges ON cp.id = charges.charging_process_id
  WHERE
	  cp.car_id = $car_id
	  AND cp.charge_energy_added > 0.01
	  AND $__timeFilter(start_date)
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
	now() AS time,
	sum(charge_energy_added) AS value,
	current AS metric
FROM data
GROUP BY 3
ORDER BY metric DESC;

WITH charge_data AS (
SELECT COALESCE(geofence.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(address.name, nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', address.road, address.house_number), '')), address.city)) AS loc_nm
, AVG(position.latitude) AS lat 
, AVG(position.longitude) AS lng
,sum(charge.charge_energy_added) AS chg_total
FROM charging_processes charge
LEFT JOIN addresses address ON charge.address_id = address.id
LEFT JOIN positions position ON charge.position_id = position.id
LEFT JOIN geofences geofence ON charge.geofence_id = geofence.id
WHERE $__timeFilter(charge.start_date) 
AND charge.car_id = $car_id
GROUP BY COALESCE(geofence.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(address.name, nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', address.road, address.house_number), '')), address.city))
) 
SELECT loc_nm
	,lat
	,lng
	,chg_total
	,chg_total * 1.0 / (SELECT sum(chg_total) FROM charge_data) * 100   AS pct
FROM charge_data

WITH data AS (
  SELECT
		cp.id,
		cp.duration_min,
		CASE WHEN NULLIF(mode() within group (order by charger_phases),0) is null THEN 'DC'
				 ELSE 'AC'
		END AS current
	FROM charging_processes cp
  RIGHT JOIN charges ON cp.id = charges.charging_process_id
  WHERE
	  cp.car_id = $car_id
	  AND cp.charge_energy_added > 0.01
	  AND $__timeFilter(start_date)
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
	now() AS time,
	sum(duration_min) * 60 AS value,
	current AS metric
FROM data
GROUP BY 3
ORDER BY metric DESC;

SELECT
  c.battery_level as "SOC [%]",
  round(avg(c.charger_power), 0) as "Power [kW]",
  c.charging_process_id as "charging_process_id",
  COALESCE(g.name, a.name) || ' ' || to_char(c.date, 'YYYY-MM-dd') as "Charge"
FROM
  charges c
JOIN charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id 
JOIN addresses a ON a.id = p.address_id
LEFT JOIN geofences g ON g.id = p.geofence_id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date)
 AND p.car_id = $car_id
 AND charger_power > 0
 AND c.fast_charger_present
GROUP BY c.battery_level, c.charging_process_id, a.name, g.name, to_char(c.date, 'YYYY-MM-dd')

SELECT
  c.battery_level as "B - SOC [%]",
  PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY charger_power) as "B - Avg Power [kW]"
FROM
  charges c
join
  charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date)
 AND p.car_id = $car_id
 AND charger_power > 0
 AND c.fast_charger_present
GROUP BY battery_level

SELECT
	ROUND(end_battery_level / 5, 0) * 5 AS SOC,
	count(*) AS n
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND duration_min > 3
	AND car_id = $car_id
GROUP BY
	ROUND(end_battery_level / 5, 0) * 5
ORDER BY
	SOC DESC

SELECT
	ROUND(start_battery_level / 5, 0) * 5 AS SOC,
	count(*) AS n
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND duration_min > 3
	AND car_id = $car_id
GROUP BY
  1
ORDER BY
	SOC DESC

SELECT
	COALESCE(geofence.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(address.name, nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', address.road, address.house_number), '')), address.city)) AS location,
	CASE
      WHEN SUM(charge_energy_added) < 1000 THEN SUM(charge_energy_added)::NUMERIC(4,0)::VARCHAR || ' kWh' 
      WHEN SUM(charge_energy_added) < 1000000 THEN (SUM(charge_energy_added) / 1000)::NUMERIC(9, 3)::VARCHAR || ' MWh' 
      WHEN SUM(charge_energy_added) >= 1000000 THEN (SUM(charge_energy_added) / 1000000)::NUMERIC(9, 3)::VARCHAR || ' GWh' 
   END as charge_energy_added
FROM
	charging_processes c
LEFT JOIN addresses address ON c.address_id = address.id
LEFT JOIN geofences geofence ON geofence_id = geofence.id
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id
GROUP BY
	1
ORDER BY
	SUM(charge_energy_added) DESC
LIMIT 17;

SELECT
	COALESCE(geofence.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(address.name, CONCAT_WS(' ', address.road, address.house_number)), address.city)) AS location,
	sum(cost) as cost
FROM
	charging_processes c
	LEFT JOIN addresses address ON c.address_id = address.id
	LEFT JOIN geofences geofence ON geofence_id = geofence.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(end_date) AND
	car_id = $car_id AND
	COST IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
	1
ORDER BY
	2 DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT 17;

list.definition: SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value FROM cars ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC;
list.label: Car
list.name: car_id
list.query: SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value FROM cars ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC;
